transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hanji bataiye. Hello.

Customer: Hanji bataiye. Hello.

Executive: Awaz aa rahi hai?

Customer: Hanji hanji aa rahi hai.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Ha madam main aap madam main aapko ye bol raha tha.

Customer: Ha ha.

Executive: Ki aap aapke IndiaMART mein Meenakshi ply kaler Bhiwandi se baat kar raha hun.

Customer: Hanji hanji main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hun. Company ka naam bataiye.

Customer: Meenakshi ply len kaler.

Executive: Okay okay thik hai. Bataiye.

Customer: Madam mere paas kal aapke customer ki ek lead aayi thi Sunil Modi karke.

Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Hamare customer hai?

Customer: Ha? Bataiye aage bataiye.

Customer: Madam Sunil Modi karke customer ki lead aayi hai to unka kya business verify detail aapne mention kiya hai IndiaMART se mere ko unke bare mein thoda kuch janna tha.

Executive: Ah, ek lead aayi hai abhi aap. Kitne time ho gaya sir? Matlab kab ki hai wo lead?

Customer: Sir ye lead koi lead chalu dekhiye kab mila hai? Dedh mahine se.

Customer: Madam ye yesterday mila hai raat kal mila hai madam.

Executive: Hmm hmm. Kal ka hai.

Executive: By lead ki baat kar rahe hain na sir aap?

Customer: By lead lead manager mein jaiye na madam lead manager mein aapko pata chalega. 

Executive: Ha ha lead manager mein hun by lead Imran synthetic kuch likha hai.

Executive: Achcha.

Executive: Product ka naam bataiye kya requirement hai unka? Account open kiya hai kya mera aapne?

Executive: Hanji hanji sir main wahi keh rahi hun product ka naam bataiye kya requirement hai unka?

Customer: Unka to madam ply ka requirement hai unhone product dala hai Gurjan brown 710 marine plywood.

Executive: Achcha ek second rukiye.

Executive: Aapne wo consume kar liya hai kya?

Customer: Madam consume se pehle mere ko aapse kuch personally detail puchna tha mere ko ye thoda customer pe actually doubt aa raha hai ye matlab verify account hai ya nahi hai mere ko wo janna tha actually kya karte hain unka business profile kuch aapke paas aaya hai aapne direct verified kiya hai wo janna tha.

Executive: Achcha ek second rukiye.

Customer: Kaisa hai na madam hamare paas.

Executive: Ha madam.

Executive: System pe hai na abhi aap?

Customer: System pe nahi mere mobile se operate karta hun main.

Executive: Achcha mobile se operate kar rahe hain. Kyunki sir system aur mobile mein thoda jo by leads hoti hai na upar neeche ho rahi hai isliye main puch rahi thi aapse.

Customer: Madam kal ki leads mein dekhiye na Sunil Modi karke dala hai unhone apna lead.

Executive: Sir yahan pe hame buyer ka naam nahi show hota hai na yahan pe hame sirf ya to location show hota hai ya to unka product kya hai wo show hota hai. Location location location madam dekhiye na location wo unka ghoregao bata rahe hain lekin wo actual mein chaiye ka uska idea nahi hai apne ko lekin unhone jo product dala unhone to wo main aapko bata sakta hun madam.

Executive: Ha.

Customer: Gurjan brown 710 marine plywood thickness 6 mm 84 size likha hai bas. 80 sheet.

Executive: 710 okay okay thik hai marine Gurjan marine.

Customer: Unka mobile number bataun kya madam?

Executive: Ha inka note bataiye inka mobile number. Unka wahan pe sab wo aa raha hoga na buyer ka details kab se hain wo IndiaMART se members.

Customer: Madam buyer detail wagera to sab bata raha hai actually lekin kaisa hai ki mere ko thoda inke upar doubt aa raha hai iske liye main aapse matlab customer ke IndiaMART pe phone karke aapse confirm kar raha hun ki hai kaun actual mein ye bande.

Executive: Achcha thik hai ek bar number bataiye aap main unka wo check karti hun.

Customer: Inka number likhiye 99208

Executive: 99208

Customer: 30025

Executive: 30025

Customer: Ha ye actual mein inka kya business hai ye karte kya hai matlab inka kuch ID wagera aap lete hain ya direct verify karte hain IndiaMART se?

Executive: Nahi nahi sir Imran naam hai na inka?

Customer: Ha sir ha madam Imran inka naam Sunil Modi hai inka business ka naam hai Imran synthetic.

Executive: Achcha.

Executive: Ha. To madam dekhenge business verify detail hai. Inhone GST wagera kuch dala nahi hai kya inka GST details wagera?

Executive: Sir IndiaMART se inka na ye IndiaMART se service lete hain par inka IndiaMART se kuch aisa hota hai na jaise ki aapka service chal raha hai waise inka service nahi chal raha hai ye bas IndiaMART se business karte hain.

Customer: 11 saal se.

Executive: Karte hain matlab genuine genuine account hai madam?

Executive: Ha sir ye genuine account hai lekin yahi hai ki inka koi IndiaMART se service nahi chal raha hai lekin IndiaMART se sale aur purchase karte hain.

Customer: Sale aur purchase karte hain lekin madam koi matlab government officer wagera to nahi hai actual mein aisa?

Executive: Aisa kuch nahi hai sir aapka koi product aisa thodi na hai jo government ya illegal ho aap to plywood mein hi deal karte hain.

Customer: Madam legal to hamara sab rehta hai lekin kaisa hai na madam main aapko genuine baat bataun to kabhi kabhi hum log without GST mein bhi maal dete hain actual mein.

Executive: Achcha achcha to koi issue nahi hai aap jaise whatsapp pe baat hota hai to aisa to hai nahi ki aap unko matlab sara cheez payment wement ki baat karte hain aap bhi to verify karte honge na sir aap unki details mangte honge unka business ka card mangte honge kuch to mangte honge aap bhi.

Executive: Kyunki yahan se dekho main aapko bata rahi hun ki unka matlab 11 saal se wo IndiaMART se hota hai na free ki jo service hoti hai unse ki call aata hai ya fir koi IndiaMART unko dhundta hai to is tarike ki wo kar rahe hain lekin unka koi genuine yahan se koi service nahi chal rahi jaise ki aapka service chal raha hai waise. Aur wo 11 saal se hain IndiaMART pe.

Executive: Awaz aa rahi hai aapko?

Executive: Hello?

Executive: Hello?
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to verify customer details.

- Wants to know if customer is genuine.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed customer is genuine.

- Explained customer has been on IndiaMART for 11 years.

- Clarified customer uses free services only.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- verification, buyleads, customer details, indiaMART services
